p: The protective effects of the samples against human coronavirus 229E (HCoV-229) was determined based on the previously described method [ 88]. The Huh7 cells line (human liver carcinoma cell line) was obtained from Dr. Rei-Lin Kuo (Chang Gung University, Taoyuan, Taiwan). The cells were infected with nine times the Median Tissue Culture Infectious Dose (TCID 50) of each coronavirus 229E in the presence or absence of the compounds or vehicle. After incubation at 33 Â°C for 6 days, the surviving cells were then stained with MTT (3-[4.5-dimethylthiazol-2-yl]-2,5-diphenyl tetrazolium bromide). The percentage of surviving cells was then calculated.
